description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Midgard Components (MidCOM) Framework before 8.09.1 have unknown impact and attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4630

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Message::AddToString function in message/Message.cpp in MUSCLE before 4.40 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted message.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4631

description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in index.php in Kure 0.6.3, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allow remote attackers to read and possibly execute arbitrary local files via a .. (dot dot) in the (1) post and (2) doc parameters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4632

description: SQL injection vulnerability in Node Vote 5.x before 5.x-1.1 and 6.x before 6.x-1.0, a module for Drupal, when "Allow user to vote again" is enabled, allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors related to a "previously cast vote."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4633

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Movable Type 4 through 4.21 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unknown vectors related to the administrative page, a different vulnerability than CVE-2008-4079.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4634

description: Unspecified vulnerability in Hisanaga Electric Co, Ltd. hisa_cart 1.29 and earlier, a module for XOOPS, allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive user information via unknown vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4635

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in cpCommerce before 1.2.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unknown vectors in the advanced search feature.  NOTE: this is probably a variant of CVE-2008-4121.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4637

description: qioadmin in the Quick I/O for Database feature in Symantec Veritas File System (VxFS) on HP-UX, and before 5.0 MP3 on Solaris, Linux, and AIX, allows local users to read arbitrary files by causing qioadmin to write a file's content to standard error in an error message.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4638

description: jhead.c in Matthias Wandel jhead 2.84 and earlier allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4639

description: The DoCommand function in jhead.c in Matthias Wandel jhead 2.84 and earlier allows local users to delete arbitrary files via vectors involving a modified input filename in which (1) a final "z" character is replaced by a "t" character or (2) a final "t" character is replaced by a "z" character.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2008-4640

description: The DoCommand function in jhead.c in Matthias Wandel jhead 2.84 and earlier allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in unspecified input.
